Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals.

Items.Title: Oversight - Maternal Health, Mortality, and Morbidity.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Maternal Health, Mortality, and Morbidity.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing access to data on maternal mortality and morbidity
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing access to data on maternal mortality and morbidity.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a program in the department of health and mental hygiene to train doulas and provide doula services to residents in all five boroughs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a program in the department of health and mental hygiene to train doulas and provide doula services to residents in all five boroughs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an outreach and education campaign on the benefits and services provided by doulas and midwives
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: An outreach and education campaign on the benefits and services provided by doulas and midwives.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to provide information on polycystic ovary syndrome and endometriosis
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to provide information on polycystic ovary syndrome and endometriosis.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the provision of sexual and reproductive health services by the department of health and mental hygiene
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the provision of sexual and reproductive health services by the department of health and mental hygiene.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring family building benefits for city employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring family building benefits for city employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a public education and outreach campaign on maternal mortality and morbidity and a report regarding the incidence of cesarean sections
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Public education and outreach campaign on maternal mortality and morbidity and a report regarding the incidence of cesarean sections.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A217/S2736, relating to informing maternity patients about the risks associated with cesarean section.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Informing maternity patients about the risks associated with cesarean section. (A217/S2736)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon New York State Legislature to establish full insurance coverage for fertility treatments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish full insurance coverage for fertility treatments.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation making doulas more accessible to individuals with Medicaid and those without health insurance.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making doulas more accessible to individuals with Medicaid and those without health insurance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to education about city standards for respectful care at birth, health care proxy forms and patients’ rights
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Education about city standards for respectful care at birth, health care proxy forms and patients’ rights.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass and President Joseph Biden to sign the Black Maternal Health Momnibus Act of 2021
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Black Maternal Health Momnibus Act of 2021.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to provide expanded funding for the Healthy Start Brooklyn doula program known as By My Side in order to make doulas available to all low-income birthing people in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to provide expanded funding for the Healthy Start Brooklyn doula program known as By My Side in order to make doulas available to all low-income birthing people in New York City.
